name: Beeper
description:
You sit down at a bus stop and notice a phone bomb next to you...disarm the beeper before it's too late!

This game was created for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3.

The game is designed to play at 84px x 48px, but has been upscaled to 504px x 288px.

Controls

Use the number pad on your keyboard to mimic the pattern the phone creates.

Asterisk* activates your replay ability.

Spacebar or + submits your response.

Escape key exits the game.

*Alternative controls if you are on laptop or don't have a number pad.

Use these buttons as a number pad:

q   w   e

a   s   d

z   x   c

R activates your replay ability.

Spacebar submits your response.

Escape key exits the game.

Credits

Developed by chrischris

Special thanks to my scroops (Serina).
